title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1903.6 - Conditions of award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1903.6 - Conditions of award

State Regulations
(a) The
corporation shall provide the applicant who has been awarded a payment, grant
or loan a list of conditions that must be met before a regulatory agreement may
be entered into. (b) The
corporation shall notify the applicant of the sufficiency of or insufficiency
of the documents within 15 working days after receipt of all documents required
by the list of conditions. (c) The
corporation shall enter into a regulatory agreement within 45 working days of
the satisfaction of the list of conditions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1903.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
